TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlAttributeProperties extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝 之 XML 語言相關的屬性。

span.span: Encapsulates the XML language-related attributes of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會實作附加的屬性支援， ，並和。This class implements attached property support for , , and and . 這些屬性通常只使用 WPF XAML 剖析器實作[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。These properties are generally only used by the WPF XAML parser implementation for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 從 XAML 標記的實際使用者連接的程式碼屬性呼叫不是主要的案例。Actual user code attached property calls from XAML markup is not the primary scenario. 屬性會實作為附加屬性中，主要是使屬性可以進一步透過所有可能的物件圖形的相依性屬性支援屬性繼承概念。The properties are implemented as attached properties primarily so that the properties can better support the property inheritance concept for dependency properties through all possible object graphs. 因此，這真的是基礎結構支援類別。As such, this is really an infrastructure support class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性值繼承](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance.md)。For more information, see [Property Value Inheritance](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/property-value-inheritance.md).

summary.span: 取得或設定附加屬性值，這個值會儲存供 .NET Framework 3.0 與 .NET Framework 3.5 之 WPF XAML 剖析器使用的 XML 命名空間對應。

span.span: Gets or sets an attached property value that stores XML namespace maps for use by the WPF XAML parser for .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||
